Package com.hexaware.dao

Class VehicleDao

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.VehicleDao
public class VehicleDao extends Object
This class provides methods to interact with the Vehicle database table.

  • Method Details

    • getVehicleById

      public Vehicle getVehicleById(int vehicleId) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, VehicleNotFoundException
      Retrieves a vehicle by its ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - The ID of the vehicle to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The vehicle object if found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
      VehicleNotFoundException - If the vehicle with the given ID is not found.

    • getAvailableVehicles

      public List<Vehicle> getAvailableVehicles() throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves a list of available vehicles from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of available vehicle objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.

    • addVehicle

      public boolean addVehicle(Vehicle vehicle) throws DatabaseConnectionException
      Adds a new vehicle to the database.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The vehicle object to add.
      Returns:
      True if the addition is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.

    • updateVehicle

      public boolean updateVehicle(int vehicleId, String updateField, String updateValue) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, VehicleNotFoundException
      Updates a vehicle's information in the database.
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - The ID of the vehicle to update.
      updateField - The field to update (e.g., "dailyRate").
      updateValue - The new value for the field.
      Returns:
      True if the update is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
      VehicleNotFoundException - If the vehicle with the given ID is not found.

    • removeVehicle

      public boolean removeVehicle(int vehicleId) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, VehicleNotFoundException
      Removes a vehicle from the database.
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - The ID of the vehicle to remove.
      Returns:
      True if the removal is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
      VehicleNotFoundException - If the vehicle with the given ID is not found.

    • fetchAllVehicles

      public List<Vehicle> fetchAllVehicles() throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException
      Fetches a list of all vehicles from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all vehicle objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
